examples: Election season always puts my dad's back up.
Dr. Jaffe pinned her ears back.
Right, pin back your ears, everyone.
I ran the tape back.
The enemy was driven back.
words.defineEn: in the direction behind us
words.defineVi: theo hướng phía sau chúng tôi

examples: Right, pin back your ears, everyone.
That extension is busy right now.
I want a dish of creamy mushroom bucatini with Parmesan right now.
Right by holding the candle to the devil.
After the traffic lights, turn right.
words.defineEn: the direction or side that is toward the east when someone or something is facing north
words.defineVi: hướng hoặc mặt hướng về phía đông khi ai đó hoặc thứ gì đó hướng về phía bắc

examples: The children scarfed down the pizza at the birthday party.
Turn the mould upside down.
His parents are always breathing down his neck.
That song always sends a shiver down my spine.
A path led down the hill.
words.defineEn: from a point that is high or higher on a thing to a point that is lower
words.defineVi: từ một điểm cao hoặc cao hơn trên một vật đến một điểm thấp hơn

examples: The hall will be able to let in more spectators.
The journalist's investigation revealed the corruption that was taking place in the halls of power, where powerful individuals were making deals that benefited themselves rather than the public.
Hall thrusters also use their fuel really efficiently.
Two halls, Paint Shop North and Paint Shop South, comprise BMW Manufacturing's paint shop.
This hall of mirrors only lets blue light escape.
words.defineEn: a passage that is inside a house or building with rooms on both side
words.defineVi: một lối đi bên trong một ngôi nhà hoặc tòa nhà có phòng ở cả hai bên

examples: Take your pick.
His new world record will take some beating.
His apology took the edge off her anger.
Things like this take time.
The river took a meandering bend through the picturesque valley.
words.defineEn: to reach for something and hold it
words.defineVi: để đạt được cho một cái gì đó và giữ nó

examples: The escalator represents the laws of physics driving you forwards.
So, you know, the escalator speech.
So, you know, the escalator speech.
So Donald Trump comes down that golden escalator.
He comes down the escalator.
words.defineEn: a staircase that moves and takes people up or down different levels easily, often found in large buildings like airports, department stores, etc.
words.defineVi: một cầu thang di chuyển và đưa mọi người lên hoặc xuống các cấp độ khác nhau một cách dễ dàng, thường được tìm thấy trong các tòa nhà lớn như sân bay, cửa hàng bách hóa, v.v.

words.defineEn: to go to a higher place
words.defineVi: đi đến một nơi cao hơn

examples: Take your pick.
His new world record will take some beating.
His apology took the edge off her anger.
Things like this take time.
The river took a meandering bend through the picturesque valley.
words.defineEn: to use a particular route or means of transport in order to go somewhere
words.defineVi: sử dụng một tuyến đường hoặc phương tiện giao thông cụ thể để đi đâu đó

examples: Those stairs kill me every time!
She took a tumble down the stairs.
She went sobbing up the stairs.
I prefer taking the elevator in tall buildings rather than using the stairs.
He huffed and puffed as he carried the heavy box up the stairs.
words.defineEn: a series of steps connecting two floors of a building, particularly built inside a building
words.defineVi: một loạt các bước kết nối hai tầng của một tòa nhà, đặc biệt được xây dựng bên trong một tòa nhà

words.defineEn: to go to a lower place
words.defineVi: đi đến một nơi thấp hơn

examples: We took the elevator to the top floor of the building.
The elevator arrived after a couple of minutes of waiting.
The slow elevator took a long time to reach the desired floor.
The elevator doors opened, revealing a crowded lobby.
I felt a bit nervous when the elevator suddenly stopped between floors.
words.defineEn: a box-like device that moves up and down and is used to get to the different levels of a building
words.defineVi: một thiết bị giống như hộp di chuyển lên xuống và được sử dụng để đi đến các tầng khác nhau của tòa nhà

examples: A self-made vase will give any interior a touch of originality.
She has a great aesthetic sense when it comes to interior design.
The Brie cheese had a soft and creamy interior, with a bloomy white cheese rind.
The interior designer can't get any work done with your puppy on her heels!
Interiors are better than Mercedes-Benz interiors.
words.defineEn: the internal part of a building, car, etc.
words.defineVi: phần bên trong của một tòa nhà, xe hơi, vv

examples: The jury is still out as concerns the location of the new station.
She unfolded the map to find the location of the tourist attractions.
Having 3 locations in the same area creates a situation that the left doesn't know what the right hand is doing.
Whenever a celebrity is spotted in town, fans make a beeline for the location, hoping to catch a glimpse or snap a photo.
I used my finger to point at the map and show them the location.
words.defineEn: the geographic position of someone or something
words.defineVi: vị trí địa lý của một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: The wind has changed direction.
Finally things are moving in the right direction.
We followed the map's directions to reach the hiking trail.
These directions are plain as a pikestaff, so you shouldn't have any questions.
These directions are as clear as a bell, so you shouldn't have any questions.
words.defineEn: the position that someone or something faces, points, or moves toward
words.defineVi: vị trí mà ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó phải đối mặt, chỉ hoặc di chuyển về phía

examples: They topped fruit tarts with mango coulis.
The fish tacos were topped with tangy slaw and creamy sauce.
This dictionary goes on the top shelf.
We topped our baked potatoes with a generous drizzle of bechamel sauce.
Write your name at the top of the paper.
words.defineEn: the point or part of something that is the highest
words.defineVi: điểm hoặc một phần của một cái gì đó là cao nhất

examples: The senator held the floor for several hours.
At precisely 6:45 a.m. the rowdiness ceases as Sailor, a union safety expert, takes the floor for his weekly lecture.
She covered the floor with a colorful carpet.
They wiped the floor with us in a 3–0 win.
Share prices have gone through the floor.
words.defineEn: the bottom of a room that we walk on
words.defineVi: dưới cùng của một căn phòng mà chúng tôi đi bộ trên

examples: Water will always find its own level.
The Geiger counter detected high levels of radiation in the vicinity of the radioactive material.
As the saying goes, new levels, new devils.
The conflict has now reached a new level of intensity.
All through the hijacking the pilot kept a level head.
words.defineEn: one of the many floors that are in a building
words.defineVi: một trong nhiều tầng trong một tòa nhà

examples: She lives on the third floor of a residential building.
That piece of work just rejected my resume for the third time!
I got the third degree when I got home last night.
A third of dog owners have experienced love at first sight when setting eyes on their dog.
The pair went toe to toe until the third set, when Azarenka squandered two match points.
words.defineEn: coming or happening right after the second person or thing
words.defineVi: đến hoặc xảy ra ngay sau người thứ hai hoặc điều

examples: Her second movie followed close on the heels of her successful film debut.
Her second movie followed close on the heels of her successful film debut.
Take the second road on the right.
Swimming is second nature to Jane.
She came second in the exam.
words.defineEn: coming or happening just after the first person or thing
words.defineVi: đến hoặc xảy ra ngay sau người đầu tiên hoặc điều

examples: More conservative candidates are losing ground in key battleground states.
As a health-conscious individual, he sprinkled ground flaxseed over his morning yogurt.
The company is gaining ground rapidly with its new product launch.
Her skirt almost reached the ground.
The grounds covered eight acres.
words.defineEn: the surface layer of Earth that is solid and people walk on
words.defineVi: lớp bề mặt của Trái đất rắn chắc và mọi người đi bộ trên

examples: The house has a basement where they store their belongings.
She lives downstairs in the basement apartment.
And our basement miraculously survived.
He retreated to his basement.
- This is a basement on steroids.
words.defineEn: an area or room in a house or building that is partially or completely below the ground level
words.defineVi: một khu vực hoặc căn phòng trong một ngôi nhà hoặc tòa nhà nằm dưới mặt đất một phần hoặc hoàn toàn

examples: I've got two left feet!
She turned the wheel sharply to the left.
I got a sudden pain in my left eye.
The left didn't know what the right was doing in this gross teen horror comedy.
On the left the ground drops away, giving a view over the rooftops.
words.defineEn: toward or located on the same side as the heart of most people
words.defineVi: hướng tới hoặc nằm cùng phía với trái tim của hầu hết mọi người

examples: She knows her part in the play back to front.
My mom planted beautiful flowers in the front yard.
Carolyn served them iced tea on the front porch.
Creating new music isn't exactly on his front burner anymore.
She had a gap between her front teeth that added character to her smile.
words.defineEn: the part or surface of an object that is faced forward, seen first, or used first
words.defineVi: phần hoặc bề mặt của một vật thể hướng về phía trước, được nhìn thấy trước hoặc được sử dụng trước
